titles.title: Give Up! And Let Jesus Take Over

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give up! And let Jesus take over.
Give up! And let Jesus take over.
Give up! And let Jesus take over.
And He'll make a way for you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you have a mountain that you can't climb,
If you have a river that you can't cross,
If you have a valley where you can't stand,
Give up, and let Jesus have His way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sede Ya! y deja a Cristo governarte (3x)
Y El te cambiara.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Si estas ante un monte que no puedes escalar,
Si estas ante un rio que no puedes cruzar,
Si estas ante un valle que no puedes pasar,
Sede ya! y deja a Cristo governar.
